snippet.title: Squadron 51 - BEHIND THE CINEMATICS
snippet.description:
▷▷▷ Add Squadron 51 to your Steam Wishlist: http://bit.ly/Squadron51

Check out behind the scenes from our work on Squadron 51 videos. See for yourself how we made our movies with special effects, incredible stuns, and the unbelievable wizardry of post-production!
---
UFOs! Aliens! Aircrafts! Resistance! SHOOT 'EM UP! Squadron 51 is a spaceship shooter with 2D gameplay and 3D environment. Enjoy a smart combination of fast-paced shooting experience and the 1950's sci-fi movies aesthetic, with live-action cutscenes. 

► Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1378800/Squadron_51/
► FB Page: https://www.facebook.com/squadron51/
► Our Twitter: https://twitter.com/51_squadron
